title: Font-du-Buis
description: An ancient necropolis documented during rescue excavation in the early 1970s at a location known as Font-du-Buis or La Fontaine du Buis between Saze and Avingon in Gard, France.

properties.description: Location determined in Google Earth with reference to features and roads corresponding to Figure 1 in Gagni√®re 1972 (there has been major highway construction in the intervening half century), but the area of the necropolis does not seem to have been built over.
properties.title: Approximate Imagery Location of Necropolis
